name: PkmMoviesList
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: p. k. m. movies list
des:
Skill created for Alexa that allows us to list all existing pokemon movies currently telling you only: all.

On the other hand we can also list only one of those we want with the following command: pokemon + number of the movie (from 1 to 23) and the skill will tell us the title of the movie to which it corresponds.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
